item.title: PHP goto statement
item.author: Dennis T Kaplan
item.description:
I just discovered that the goto statement is available since php 5.3
I love the guys from php for that.
I am a hobby programmer and unlike the processionals, I learned OOP via php, which is great but having goto available like back in the Amiga days made my day.
